snippet: Kristine Leschper’s band is part of a wavelet of stark and sincere music by women like Julien Baker, Soak and Waxahatchee.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews album When You Walk a Long Distance You Are Tired by band Mothers.
lead_paragraph: Kristine Leschper’s band is part of a wavelet of stark and sincere music by women like Julien Baker, Soak and Waxahatchee.

headline.main: Review: On the Debut Album by Mothers, Austere Honesty
